attributes.action: Should the age of being tried as an adult, be lowered from 18 to 16?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As 16 years old are allowed to work, pay taxes, play the lottery, smoke, get married (with parental consent), and ride motorcycles under a specified engine size. In these circumstances, society deems 16 year old teenagers able to make a logical and rational decision regarding their lifestyle and life choices.
 

In the current society today, with an ever increasing number of older teenagers being charged with serious offences, should the age of being tried in a court of law as an adult, be lowered from the current age of 18, to 16.
